channel.title: WASD Movement. Tiles
channel.description:
Is there any way how I can downsize tiles for my WASD movement? And I need someone who can make me a simple system for WASD, I need that if you click enter to chat. When I type wasd they don't appear in my chatbox. so enter would disable WASD movement.
Help very much appreciated.

item.title: WASD Movement. Tiles
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

I surely did google it.

Read full topic

item.title: WASD Movement. Tiles

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I have seen this on Rune-Serber a couple of months ago. There were two versions of it. If you really wanted it, you would have Googled it.

http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/321507-fps-wasd-client.html

Read full topic

item.title: WASD Movement. Tiles
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Mario PvP, post:5, topic:478016”]What if it’s FPS, it would good then?

the movement is based on my compass. so which direction I face. but I need to downsize tiles for smooth walking. or Floorpixels instead floortiles :S[/quote]

Well obviously we are not talking about a fps, and besides, I meant more 3rd person games, It’s not really appealing to people who are used to Runescape’s controls.

Read full topic
